This is an exciting time to join an awesome team and add a hit game to your portfolio. results.title: Senior UI Artist
Visual Effects Artist (VFX)
results.description: As our dedicated Visual Effects Artist you will design, create and implement dynamic, stunning and above all broadly appealing visual effects for both our existing and upcoming casual games. You will work directly with some of the world's top talent in Art, Design and engineering to create compelling effects that help enrich our millions of players' game experience. We are looking for a Principal Art Manager to lead our team of more than 30 artists working across seven casual games. Our goal is to create gorgeous puzzle games for smartphones and tablets, and we are looking for an experienced Studio Art Manager to help drive the visual quality of our games to the next level. results.title: Studio Art Director

results.description: Based in Berlin, Europe's creative tech capital, our employees from 40 nations work together to develop top titles for a global audience. Working in independent teams, our signature approach to making great games for mobile has made us one of the world's most popular developers. We are looking for a 3D Modeller to work on one of our exciting upcoming mobile games. The title is in development but to get to the standards we pride ourselves on we want to add to the team. results.title: 3D Artist
2D Environment Artist - Hidden Object Games
results.description: We are currently working on a new Hidden Object Game, and the key to a successful game in the genre is creating environments and scenes our players love. To do that we need strong 2D Artists who can create environments from concept to final product that match the theme and story.
